00032 // rotation by 120 deg
00033 #define R1xx -0.5
00034 #define R1xy -0.5*sqrt(3.0)
00035 #define R1yx 0.5*sqrt(3.0)
00036 #define R1yy -0.5
00037 
00038 #define R1uu 0.5
00039 #define R1ud -0.5*sqrt(3.0)
00040 #define R1du 0.5*sqrt(3.0)
00041 #define R1dd 0.5
00042 
00043 // rotation by 240 deg
00044 #define R2xx -0.5
00045 #define R2xy 0.5*sqrt(3.0)
00046 #define R2yx -0.5*sqrt(3.0)
00047 #define R2yy -0.5
00048 
00049 #define R2uu -0.5
00050 #define R2ud -0.5*sqrt(3.0)
00051 #define R2du 0.5*sqrt(3.0)
00052 #define R2dd -0.5
00053 
00054 
00055 typedef struct {
00056   int* ng;
00057   int* idx;
00058   int* xi;              
00059 } FMDd3hInternals;
00060 
00061 
00062 Parameterization ParameterizationFMDd3h = {
00063   name : "FMDd3h",
00064   Pararead : FMDd3hread,
00065   Parawrite : FMDd3hwrite,
00066   Paraclone : FMDd3hclone,
00067   ParainitSlaterDet : FMDd3hinitSlaterDet,
00068   ParatoSlaterDet : FMDd3htoSlaterDet,
00069   ParaprojectgradSlaterDet : FMDd3hprojectgradSlaterDet
00070 };

00073 // number of real parameter of a Gaussian
00074 #define NGAUSS 12               
00075 
00076 
00077 void FMDd3hclone(const Para* q, Para* qp)
00078 {
00079   int i;
00080 
00081   strcpy(qp->name, q->name);
00082   qp->A = q->A; qp->Z = q->Z; qp->N = q->N;
00083   qp->n = q->n;
00084 
00085   qp->x = (double*) malloc(q->n*sizeof(double));
00086   for (i=0; i<q->n; i++)
00087     qp->x[i] = q->x[i];
00088 
00089   qp->ngauss = q->ngauss;
00090   qp->internals = malloc(sizeof(FMDd3hInternals));
00091   FMDd3hInternals *qpint = qp->internals;
00092   FMDd3hInternals *qint = q->internals;
00093 
00094   qpint->ng = malloc(q->A/3*sizeof(int));
00095   for (i=0; i<q->A/3; i++)
00096     qpint->ng[i] = qint->ng[i];
00097   qpint->idx = malloc(q->A/3*sizeof(int));
00098   for (i=0; i<q->A/3; i++)
00099     qpint->idx[i] = qint->idx[i];
00100   qpint->xi = malloc(q->A/3*sizeof(int));
00101   for (i=0; i<q->A/3; i++)
00102     qpint->xi[i] = qint->xi[i];
00103 
00104 }

00107 #define BUFSIZE 255
00108 
00109 int FMDd3hread(FILE* fp, Para* q)
00110 {
00111   char buf[BUFSIZE];
00112   int i;
00113   FMDd3hInternals* qint;
00114 
00115   qint = q->internals = malloc(sizeof(FMDd3hInternals));
00116                                         
00117   do
00118     fgets(buf, BUFSIZE, fp);
00119   while (strncmp(buf, "<Para ", 5) && !feof(fp));
00120   if (feof(fp)) {
00121     fprintf(stderr, "did't find <Para ...>\n");
00122     return -1;
00123   }
00124   
00125   char Pname[80], qname[80];
00126 
00127   sscanf(buf, "<Para %s %s>", Pname, qname);
00128   if (strcmp(Pname, "FMDd3h")) {
00129     fprintf(stderr, "not a FMDd3h parameter set\n");
00130     return -1;
00131   }
00132   strcpy(q->name, stripstr(qname, ">"));
00133 
00134   // read nucleon parameters
00135   fgets(buf, BUFSIZE, fp);
00136   if (sscanf(buf, "%d %d %d", &q->A, &q->Z, &q->N) != 3) {
00137     fprintf(stderr, "malformed line\n>>%s<<\n", stripstr(buf, "\n"));
00138     return -1;
00139   }
00140   if (q->A != q->Z+q->N) {
00141     fprintf(stderr, "proton and neutron number don't sum up in line\n>>%s<<\n",
00142             stripstr(buf, "\n"));
00143     return -1;
00144   }
00145   fgets(buf, BUFSIZE, fp);
00146   if (sscanf(buf, "%d", &q->ngauss) != 1) {
00147     fprintf(stderr, "malformed line\n>>%s<<\n", stripstr(buf, "\n"));
00148     return -1;
00149   }
00150 
00151   qint->idx = (int*) malloc(q->A/3*sizeof(int));
00152   qint->ng = (int*) malloc(q->A/3*sizeof(int));
00153   qint->xi = (int*) malloc(q->A/3*sizeof(int));
00154   for (i=0; i<q->A/3; i++) {
00155     qint->idx[i] = 0;
00156     qint->ng[i] = 0;
00157     qint->xi[i] = 0;
00158   }
00159   
00160   q->n = q->ngauss/3*NGAUSS;
00161 
00162   q->x = (double*) malloc(q->n*sizeof(double));
00163 
00164   int k, xi;
00165   double chi0re, chi0im, chi1re, chi1im;
00166   double are, aim, b0re, b0im, b1re, b1im, b2re, b2im; 
00167   for (i=0; i<q->ngauss/3; i++) {
00168     fgets(buf, BUFSIZE, fp);
00169     if (sscanf(buf, "%d %d "
00170                "(%lf,%lf) (%lf,%lf) (%lf,%lf) (%lf,%lf) (%lf,%lf) (%lf,%lf)", 
00171                &k, &xi, &chi0re, &chi0im, &chi1re, &chi1im, 
00172                &are, &aim, &b0re, &b0im, &b1re, &b1im, &b2re, &b2im) != 14) {
00173       fprintf(stderr, "malformed line\n>>%s<<\n", 
00174               stripstr(buf,"\n"));
00175       return -1;
00176     }
00177     qint->ng[k]++;
00178     qint->xi[k] = xi;
00179     q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 0] = chi0re; q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 1] = chi0im;
00180     q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 2] = chi1re; q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 3] = chi1im;
00181     q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 4] = are;    q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 5] = aim;
00182     q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 6] = b0re;   q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 7] = b0im;
00183     q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 8] = b1re;   q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 9] = b1im;
00184     q->x[i*NGAUSS+10] = b2re;   q->x[i*NGAUSS+11] = b2im;
00185   }     
00186   for (k=1; k<q->A/3; k++) 
00187     qint->idx[k] = qint->idx[k-1]+qint->ng[k-1];
00188 
00189   fgets(buf, BUFSIZE, fp);
00190   if (strncmp(buf, "</Para>", 7)) {
00191     fprintf(stderr, "didn't find </Para>\n");
00192     return -1;
00193   }     
00194 
00195   return 0;
00196 }

00199 int FMDd3hwrite(FILE* fp, const Para* q)
00200 {
00201   int k, ki, i;
00202   FMDd3hInternals* qint = q->internals;
00203 
00204   fprintf(fp, "<Para FMDd3h %s>\n", q->name);
00205 
00206   fprintf(fp, "%d %d %d\n", q->A, q->Z, q->N);
00207   fprintf(fp, "%d\n", q->ngauss);
00208 
00209   for (k=0; k<q->A/3; k++)
00210     for (ki=0; ki<qint->ng[k]; ki++) {
00211       i = qint->idx[k]+ki;
00212       fprintf(fp,
00213               "%2d  %+2d  (%12.8f,%12.8f)(%12.8f,%12.8f)  (%12.8f,%12.8f)  (%12.8f,%12.8f)(%12.8f,%12.8f)(%12.8f,%12.8f)\n",
00214               k, qint->xi[k],
00215               q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 0], q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 1],
00216               q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 2], q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 3],
00217               q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 4], q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 5],
00218               q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 6], q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 7],
00219               q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 8], q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 9],
00220               q->x[i*NGAUSS+10], q->x[i*NGAUSS+11]);
00221   }
00222   fprintf(fp, "</Para>\n");
00223 
00224   return 0;
00225 }

00228 void FMDd3hinitSlaterDet(const Para* q, SlaterDet* Q)
00229 {
00230   int k, ki;
00231   FMDd3hInternals* qint = q->internals;
00232 
00233   Q->A = q->A; 
00234   Q->Z = q->Z; 
00235   Q->N = q->N;
00236   Q->ngauss = q->ngauss;
00237 
00238   Q->idx = (int*) malloc(Q->A*sizeof(int));
00239   for (k=0; k<q->A/3; k++)
00240     Q->idx[k] = qint->idx[k];
00241   for (k=0; k<q->A/3; k++)
00242     Q->idx[k + q->A/3] = qint->idx[k] + q->ngauss/3;
00243   for (k=0; k<q->A/3; k++)
00244     Q->idx[k + 2*q->A/3] = qint->idx[k] + 2*q->ngauss/3;
00245 
00246   Q->ng = (int*) malloc(Q->A*sizeof(int));
00247   for (k=0; k<q->A/3; k++)
00248     Q->ng[k] = qint->ng[k];
00249   for (k=0; k<q->A/3; k++)
00250     Q->ng[k + q->A/3] = qint->ng[k];
00251   for (k=0; k<q->A/3; k++)
00252     Q->ng[k + 2*q->A/3] = qint->ng[k];
00253 
00254   Q->G = (Gaussian*) malloc(Q->ngauss*sizeof(Gaussian));
00255   for (k=0; k<q->A/3; k++) 
00256     for (ki=0; ki<qint->ng[k]; ki++)
00257       Q->G[qint->idx[k]+ki].xi = qint->xi[k]; 
00258   for (k=0; k<q->A/3; k++) 
00259     for (ki=0; ki<qint->ng[k]; ki++)
00260       Q->G[qint->idx[k]+ki + q->ngauss/3].xi = qint->xi[k]; 
00261   for (k=0; k<q->A/3; k++) 
00262     for (ki=0; ki<qint->ng[k]; ki++)
00263       Q->G[qint->idx[k]+ki + 2*q->ngauss/3].xi = qint->xi[k]; 
00264 }
00265 
00266 
00267 void FMDd3htoSlaterDet(const Para* q, SlaterDet* Q)
00268 {
00269   FMDd3hInternals* qint = q->internals;
00270 
00271   int i;
00272 
00273   complex double chiu, chid, a, bx, by, bz;
00274 
00275   // the nucleons
00276   for (i=0; i<q->ngauss/3; i++) {
00277     chiu = q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 0] + I* q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 1];
00278     chid = q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 2] + I* q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 3];
00279     a =    q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 4] + I* q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 5];
00280     bx =   q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 6] + I* q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 7];
00281     by =   q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 8] + I* q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 9];
00282     bz =   q->x[i*NGAUSS+10] + I* q->x[i*NGAUSS+11];
00283 
00284     Q->G[i].chi[0] = chiu;
00285     Q->G[i].chi[1] = chid;
00286     Q->G[i].a      = a;
00287     Q->G[i].b[0]   = bx;
00288     Q->G[i].b[1]   = by;
00289     Q->G[i].b[2]   = bz;
00290 
00291     Q->G[i + q->ngauss/3].chi[0] = R1uu*chiu + R1ud*chid;
00292     Q->G[i + q->ngauss/3].chi[1] = R1du*chiu + R1dd*chid;
00293     Q->G[i + q->ngauss/3].a      = a;
00294     Q->G[i + q->ngauss/3].b[0]   = R1xx*bx + R1xy*by;
00295     Q->G[i + q->ngauss/3].b[1]   = R1yx*bx + R1yy*by;
00296     Q->G[i + q->ngauss/3].b[2]   = bz;
00297 
00298     Q->G[i + 2*q->ngauss/3].chi[0] = R2uu*chiu + R2ud*chid;
00299     Q->G[i + 2*q->ngauss/3].chi[1] = R2du*chiu + R2dd*chid;
00300     Q->G[i + 2*q->ngauss/3].a      = a;
00301     Q->G[i + 2*q->ngauss/3].b[0]   = R2xx*bx + R2xy*by;
00302     Q->G[i + 2*q->ngauss/3].b[1]   = R2yx*bx + R2yy*by;
00303     Q->G[i + 2*q->ngauss/3].b[2]   = bz;
00304   }
00305 }
00306 
00307 
00308 void FMDd3hprojectgradSlaterDet(const Para* q,
00309                                 const gradSlaterDet* dQ, double* dq)
00310 {
00311   FMDd3hInternals* qint = q->internals;
00312   int i;
00313 
00314   // gradients with respect to nucleons
00315 
00316   for (i=0; i<q->ngauss/3; i++) {
00317     dq[i*NGAUSS+ 0] = 2.0*creal(dQ->gradval[i].chi[0]);
00318     dq[i*NGAUSS+ 1] = 2.0*cimag(dQ->gradval[i].chi[0]);
00319     dq[i*NGAUSS+ 2] = 2.0*creal(dQ->gradval[i].chi[1]);
00320     dq[i*NGAUSS+ 3] = 2.0*cimag(dQ->gradval[i].chi[1]);
00321     dq[i*NGAUSS+ 4] = 2.0*creal(dQ->gradval[i].a);
00322     dq[i*NGAUSS+ 5] = 2.0*cimag(dQ->gradval[i].a);
00323     dq[i*NGAUSS+ 6] = 2.0*creal(dQ->gradval[i].b[0]);
00324     dq[i*NGAUSS+ 7] = 2.0*cimag(dQ->gradval[i].b[0]);
00325     dq[i*NGAUSS+ 8] = 2.0*creal(dQ->gradval[i].b[1]);
00326     dq[i*NGAUSS+ 9] = 2.0*cimag(dQ->gradval[i].b[1]);
00327     dq[i*NGAUSS+10] = 2.0*creal(dQ->gradval[i].b[2]);
00328     dq[i*NGAUSS+11] = 2.0*cimag(dQ->gradval[i].b[2]);
00329   }
00330 
00331   for (i=0; i<q->ngauss/3; i++) {
00332     dq[i*NGAUSS+ 0] += R1uu* 2.0*creal(dQ->gradval[i + q->ngauss/3].chi[0]);
00333     dq[i*NGAUSS+ 1] += R1uu* 2.0*cimag(dQ->gradval[i + q->ngauss/3].chi[0]);
00334     dq[i*NGAUSS+ 0] += R1du* 2.0*creal(dQ->gradval[i + q->ngauss/3].chi[1]);
00335     dq[i*NGAUSS+ 1] += R1du* 2.0*cimag(dQ->gradval[i + q->ngauss/3].chi[1]);
00336     dq[i*NGAUSS+ 2] += R1ud* 2.0*creal(dQ->gradval[i + q->ngauss/3].chi[0]);
00337     dq[i*NGAUSS+ 3] += R1ud* 2.0*cimag(dQ->gradval[i + q->ngauss/3].chi[0]);
00338     dq[i*NGAUSS+ 2] += R1dd* 2.0*creal(dQ->gradval[i + q->ngauss/3].chi[1]);
00339     dq[i*NGAUSS+ 3] += R1dd* 2.0*cimag(dQ->gradval[i + q->ngauss/3].chi[1]);
00340     dq[i*NGAUSS+ 4] += 2.0*creal(dQ->gradval[i + q->ngauss/3].a);
00341     dq[i*NGAUSS+ 5] += 2.0*cimag(dQ->gradval[i + q->ngauss/3].a);
00342     dq[i*NGAUSS+ 6] += R1xx* 2.0*creal(dQ->gradval[i + q->ngauss/3].b[0]);
00343     dq[i*NGAUSS+ 7] += R1xx* 2.0*cimag(dQ->gradval[i + q->ngauss/3].b[0]);
00344     dq[i*NGAUSS+ 6] += R1yx* 2.0*creal(dQ->gradval[i + q->ngauss/3].b[1]);
00345     dq[i*NGAUSS+ 7] += R1yx* 2.0*cimag(dQ->gradval[i + q->ngauss/3].b[1]);
00346     dq[i*NGAUSS+ 8] += R1xy* 2.0*creal(dQ->gradval[i + q->ngauss/3].b[0]);
00347     dq[i*NGAUSS+ 9] += R1xy* 2.0*cimag(dQ->gradval[i + q->ngauss/3].b[0]);
00348     dq[i*NGAUSS+ 8] += R1yy* 2.0*creal(dQ->gradval[i + q->ngauss/3].b[1]);
00349     dq[i*NGAUSS+ 9] += R1yy* 2.0*cimag(dQ->gradval[i + q->ngauss/3].b[1]);
00350     dq[i*NGAUSS+10] += 2.0*creal(dQ->gradval[i + q->ngauss/3].b[2]);
00351     dq[i*NGAUSS+11] += 2.0*cimag(dQ->gradval[i + q->ngauss/3].b[2]);
00352   }
00353 
00354   for (i=0; i<q->ngauss/3; i++) {
00355     dq[i*NGAUSS+ 0] += R2uu* 2.0*creal(dQ->gradval[i + 2*q->ngauss/3].chi[0]);
00356     dq[i*NGAUSS+ 1] += R2uu* 2.0*cimag(dQ->gradval[i + 2*q->ngauss/3].chi[0]);
00357     dq[i*NGAUSS+ 0] += R2du* 2.0*creal(dQ->gradval[i + 2*q->ngauss/3].chi[1]);
00358     dq[i*NGAUSS+ 1] += R2du* 2.0*cimag(dQ->gradval[i + 2*q->ngauss/3].chi[1]);
00359     dq[i*NGAUSS+ 2] += R2ud* 2.0*creal(dQ->gradval[i + 2*q->ngauss/3].chi[0]);
00360     dq[i*NGAUSS+ 3] += R2ud* 2.0*cimag(dQ->gradval[i + 2*q->ngauss/3].chi[0]);
00361     dq[i*NGAUSS+ 2] += R2dd* 2.0*creal(dQ->gradval[i + 2*q->ngauss/3].chi[1]);
00362     dq[i*NGAUSS+ 3] += R2dd* 2.0*cimag(dQ->gradval[i + 2*q->ngauss/3].chi[1]);
00363     dq[i*NGAUSS+ 4] += 2.0*creal(dQ->gradval[i + 2*q->ngauss/3].a);
00364     dq[i*NGAUSS+ 5] += 2.0*cimag(dQ->gradval[i + 2*q->ngauss/3].a);
00365     dq[i*NGAUSS+ 6] += R2xx* 2.0*creal(dQ->gradval[i + 2*q->ngauss/3].b[0]);
00366     dq[i*NGAUSS+ 7] += R2xx* 2.0*cimag(dQ->gradval[i + 2*q->ngauss/3].b[0]);
00367     dq[i*NGAUSS+ 6] += R2yx* 2.0*creal(dQ->gradval[i + 2*q->ngauss/3].b[1]);
00368     dq[i*NGAUSS+ 7] += R2yx* 2.0*cimag(dQ->gradval[i + 2*q->ngauss/3].b[1]);
00369     dq[i*NGAUSS+ 8] += R2xy* 2.0*creal(dQ->gradval[i + 2*q->ngauss/3].b[0]);
00370     dq[i*NGAUSS+ 9] += R2xy* 2.0*cimag(dQ->gradval[i + 2*q->ngauss/3].b[0]);
00371     dq[i*NGAUSS+ 8] += R2yy* 2.0*creal(dQ->gradval[i + 2*q->ngauss/3].b[1]);
00372     dq[i*NGAUSS+ 9] += R2yy* 2.0*cimag(dQ->gradval[i + 2*q->ngauss/3].b[1]);
00373     dq[i*NGAUSS+10] += 2.0*creal(dQ->gradval[i + 2*q->ngauss/3].b[2]);
00374     dq[i*NGAUSS+11] += 2.0*cimag(dQ->gradval[i + 2*q->ngauss/3].b[2]);
00375   }
00376 }
